card_text: 1 Tuner + 1+ non-Tuner monsters$NIf this card is Synchro Summoned: You can activate the appropriate effect(s), depending on the non-Tuner monster(s) used as Synchro Material;$N●Normal Monster: This face-up card is unaffected by other card effects this turn.$N●Effect Monster: You can target 1 other face-up card on the field; negate that target's effects.$N●Pendulum Monster: Your opponent chooses 1 monster they control and gives control of it to you, but it cannot attack this turn.
